surahs.title: Surah Al-Ikhlas (The Sincerity)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that emphasizes the oneness of Allah.
surahs.description_my: Surah Mekah yang menekankan keesaan Allah.

ayahs.translation: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One"
ayahs.translation_my: Katakanlah, "Dialah Allah, Yang Maha Esa"

ayahs.translation: Allah, the Eternal Refuge
ayahs.translation_my: Allah, Yang Maha Dibutuhkan

ayahs.translation: He neither begets nor is born
Nor is there to Him any equivalent

surahs.title: Surah An-Naba (The Great News)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that discusses the Day of Judgment and the fate of the righteous and the wicked.

surahs.title: Surah An-Nazi'at (Those Who Pull Out)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with oaths and discusses resurrection and the story of Moses and Pharaoh.

surahs.title: Surah 'Abasa (He Frowned)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with a gentle admonition to the Prophet and discusses the equality of all believers.

surahs.title: Surah At-Takwir (The Folding Up)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that describes the events of the Day of Judgment and affirms the truth of the revelation.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Infitar (The Cleaving Asunder)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that describes the Day of Judgment and reminds humans of their accountability.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Mutaffifin (The Defrauders)
surahs.description: A surah that condemns those who give less than due measure in business transactions.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Inshiqaq (The Splitting Asunder)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that describes the Day of Judgment and the different fates of the believers and disbelievers.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Buruj (The Constellations)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with an oath by the constellations and discusses the persecution of believers.

surahs.title: Surah At-Tariq (The Night Visitor)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with an oath by the night visitor (a star) and discusses the creation of humans.

surahs.title: Surah Al-A'la (The Most High)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that glorifies Allah and provides guidance to the Prophet Muhammad.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Ghashiyah (The Overwhelming)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that describes the Day of Judgment and contrasts the fate of the wicked and the righteous.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Fajr (The Dawn)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with an oath by the dawn and discusses the fate of past nations who transgressed.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Balad (The City)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with an oath by the sacred city (Mecca) and discusses the human condition.

surahs.title: Surah Ash-Shams (The Sun)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with oaths by various natural phenomena and tells the story of Thamud.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Lail (The Night)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with oaths by the night and day, and discusses human efforts and divine guidance.

surahs.title: Surah Ad-Duha (The Morning Hours)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that consoles the Prophet Muhammad and reminds him of Allah's favors.

surahs.title: Surah Ash-Sharh (The Relief)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that consoles and encourages the Prophet Muhammad during difficult times.

surahs.title: Surah At-Tin (The Fig)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with oaths by the fig, olive, Mount Sinai, and Mecca, and discusses human creation.

surahs.title: Surah Al-'Alaq (The Clot)
surahs.description: The first surah to be revealed to Prophet Muhammad, beginning with the command to read.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Qadr (The Night of Decree)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that describes the Night of Decree (Laylat al-Qadr) when the Quran was first revealed.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Bayyinah (The Clear Evidence)
surahs.description: A Medinan surah that discusses the arrival of clear evidence and the division of people based on their response.

surahs.title: Surah Az-Zalzalah (The Earthquake)
surahs.description: A Medinan surah that vividly describes the Day of Judgment beginning with a massive earthquake.

surahs.title: Surah Al-'Adiyat (The Chargers)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that begins with an oath by the charging horses and discusses human ingratitude.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Qari'ah (The Striking Calamity)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that describes the Day of Judgment as a striking calamity.

surahs.title: Surah At-Takathur (Competition in Increase)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that warns against excessive competition for worldly gains.

surahs.title: Surah Al-'Asr (Time)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that emphasizes the importance of time and outlines the path to salvation.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Humazah (The Slanderer)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that condemns those who slander others and amass wealth without spending in charity.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Fil (The Elephant)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that recounts the story of the Army of the Elephant that attempted to destroy the Kaaba.

surahs.title: Surah Quraysh (Quraysh)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that reminds the Quraysh tribe of Allah's favors upon them and calls them to worship Him.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Ma'un (Small Kindnesses)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that describes the characteristics of those who deny the faith and neglect their duties.

surahs.title: Surah Al-Kawthar (Abundance)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that consoles the Prophet Muhammad and promises him abundant good.
surahs.description_my: Surah Mekah yang menghibur Nabi Muhammad dan menjanjikan kepadanya kebaikan yang melimpah.

ayahs.translation: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar
ayahs.translation_my: Sesungguhnya, Kami telah memberikan kepadamu nikmat yang banyak

ayahs.translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone]
ayahs.translation_my: Maka dirikanlah solat kerana Tuhanmu dan berkurbanlah

ayahs.translation: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off
ayahs.translation_my: Sesungguhnya, orang yang membencimu dialah yang terputus

surahs.title: Surah Al-Kafirun (The Disbelievers)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that clearly distinguishes between monotheism and polytheism, establishing complete disassociation.
surahs.description_my: Surah Mekah yang dengan jelas membezakan antara tauhid dan syirik, menetapkan pemisahan yang lengkap.

ayahs.translation: Say, "O disbelievers"
ayahs.translation_my: Katakanlah, "Wahai orang-orang kafir"

ayahs.translation: I do not worship what you worship
ayahs.translation_my: Aku tidak menyembah apa yang kamu sembah

ayahs.translation: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship
ayahs.translation_my: Dan kamu tidak menyembah apa yang aku sembah

ayahs.translation: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship
ayahs.translation_my: Dan aku tidak akan menyembah apa yang kamu sembah

ayahs.translation: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship
ayahs.translation_my: Dan kamu tidak akan menyembah apa yang aku sembah

ayahs.translation: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion
ayahs.translation_my: Untukmu agamamu, dan untukku agamaku

surahs.title: Surah An-Nasr (Divine Support)
surahs.description: A Medinan surah that was one of the last to be revealed, foretelling the completion of the Prophet's mission.
surahs.description_my: Surah Madinah yang merupakan salah satu surah terakhir yang diturunkan, meramalkan penyelesaian misi Nabi.

ayahs.translation: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest
ayahs.translation_my: Apabila telah datang pertolongan Allah dan kemenangan

ayahs.text: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
ayahs.translation: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes
ayahs.translation_my: Dan engkau melihat manusia masuk ke dalam agama Allah dengan berbondong-bondong

ayahs.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
ayahs.translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance
ayahs.translation_my: Maka bertasbihlah dengan memuji Tuhanmu dan mohonlah ampunan kepada-Nya. Sesungguhnya Dia adalah Maha Penerima taubat

surahs.title: Surah Al-Masad (The Palm Fiber)
surahs.description: A Meccan surah that refers to Abu Lahab, an uncle and staunch opponent of the Prophet Muhammad.
surahs.description_my: Surah Mekah yang merujuk kepada Abu Lahab, pakcik dan penentang keras Nabi Muhammad.

ayahs.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he
ayahs.translation_my: Binasalah kedua tangan Abu Lahab dan benar-benar binasa dia

ayahs.text: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayahs.translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained
ayahs.translation_my: Hartanya dan segala yang diusahakannya tidak akan memberi manfaat kepadanya

ayahs.translation: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
ayahs.translation_my: Kelak dia akan masuk ke dalam api yang bergejolak

ayahs.translation: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood
ayahs.translation_my: Dan (begitu pula) isterinya, pembawa kayu bakar

ayahs.translation: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber
ayahs.translation_my: Di lehernya ada tali dari sabut

surahs.title: Surah Al-Fatihah (The Opening)
surahs.description: The first chapter of the Quran, consisting of seven verses.
surahs.description_my: Surah pertama dalam Al-Quran, terdiri daripada tujuh ayat.

ayahs.translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful
ayahs.translation_my: Dengan nama Allah, Yang Maha Pemurah, lagi Maha Mengasihani

ayahs.translation: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds
ayahs.translation_my: Segala puji bagi Allah, Tuhan semesta alam

ayahs.translation: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful
ayahs.translation_my: Yang Maha Pemurah, lagi Maha Mengasihani

ayahs.translation: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense
ayahs.translation_my: Yang Menguasai hari Pembalasan

ayahs.translation: It is You we worship and You we ask for help
ayahs.translation_my: Hanya Engkaulah yang kami sembah dan hanya kepada Engkaulah kami meminta pertolongan

ayahs.translation: Guide us to the straight path
ayahs.translation_my: Tunjukilah kami jalan yang lurus

ayahs.text: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
ayahs.translation: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray
ayahs.translation_my: Jalan orang-orang yang Engkau beri nikmat kepada mereka, bukan jalan orang-orang yang dimurkai dan bukan pula jalan orang-orang yang sesat

words.meaning: of those who have evoked [Your] anger

questions.meaning_my: Yang Maha Pemurah, lagi Maha Mengasihani
options_my: Yang Maha Pemurah, lagi Maha Mengasihani
questions.correct_my: Yang Maha Pemurah, lagi Maha Mengasihani

surahs.title: Surah Al-Ikhlas (Sincerity)
surahs.description: A short four-verse chapter that is considered to be equivalent to one-third of the Quran in meaning.

surahs.title: Surah An-Nas (Mankind)
surahs.description: The last chapter of the Quran, seeking refuge with Allah from the evil of the whisperer.
surahs.description_my: Surah terakhir dalam Al-Quran, memohon perlindungan kepada Allah dari kejahatan pembisik.

ayahs.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind"
ayahs.translation_my: Katakanlah, "Aku berlindung kepada Tuhan manusia"

ayahs.translation: The Sovereign of mankind
ayahs.translation_my: Raja manusia

ayahs.translation: The God of mankind
ayahs.translation_my: Sembahan manusia

ayahs.translation: From the evil of the retreating whisperer
ayahs.translation_my: Dari kejahatan pembisik yang bersembunyi

ayahs.translation: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind
ayahs.translation_my: Yang membisikkan [kejahatan] ke dalam dada manusia

ayahs.translation: From among the jinn and mankind
ayahs.translation_my: Dari kalangan jin dan manusia

surahs.title: Surah Al-Falaq (The Daybreak)
surahs.description: A chapter seeking refuge with Allah from various forms of evil.
surahs.description_my: Surah yang memohon perlindungan kepada Allah dari pelbagai bentuk kejahatan.

ayahs.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak"
ayahs.translation_my: Katakanlah, "Aku berlindung kepada Tuhan yang menguasai waktu subuh"

ayahs.translation: From the evil of that which He created
ayahs.translation_my: Dari kejahatan apa yang Dia ciptakan

ayahs.translation: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
ayahs.translation_my: Dan dari kejahatan malam apabila telah gelap gulita

ayahs.translation: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
ayahs.translation_my: Dan dari kejahatan wanita-wanita tukang sihir yang menghembus pada buhul-buhul

ayahs.translation: And from the evil of an envier when he envies
ayahs.translation_my: Dan dari kejahatan pendengki bila ia dengki
